member.name: T:Game.CameraController
member.summary: Moves the camera to follow an object, but keeps it within the constraints of the current tilemaps.

member.name: P:Game.CameraController.Smoothness
member.summary: [GET / SET] How smooth the camera should follow its target.

member.name: P:Game.CameraController.TargetObject
member.summary: [GET / SET] The target object the camera should follow.
